channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: MarketWatch Live: U.S. stocks start lower. Inflation remains on investor minds.
Trump signs order pausing enforcement of foreign bribery ban
item.description: The Foreign Corrupt Practices Act became law in 1977. In 2024, the Department of Justice announced 24 cases related to the anti-bribery statute.

item.title: Shopify posts roaring holiday results but predicts its growth will slow
Trump removes director of government ethics office
item.description: President Donald Trump removed David Huitema as director of the U.S. Office of Government Ethics, the agency said.

item.title: Fed chief Jerome Powell addressing Senate banking panel — watch live
Fed chief Powell leaves door open to rate cuts but indicates he’s in no hurry
Former Trump aide Steve Bannon pleads guilty in New York 'build the wall' case
item.description: Prosecutors had said Steve Bannon, who served briefly in the first Trump administration, swindled donors of a "build the wall" campaign.

item.title: Supreme Court lawyer Tom Goldstein jailed as flight risk after cryptocurrency hiding claim
item.description: SCOTUSblog publisher Tom Goldstein was indicted in January on charges alleging he failed to declare millions of dollars in poker winnings.

item.title: Trump says Hamas should free all hostages by midday Saturday or 'let hell break out'
item.description: President Donald Trump said on Monday that Hamas should release all hostages held by the militant group in Gaza by midday Saturday or he would propose...

item.title: Could BYD ‘God’s Eye’ self-driving feature pose an existential threat to Tesla?
